AuthenticationInvitation.announcement: Please sign in or sign up to track your contributions.

FinishedAnnouncement.announcement: Finished! Looks like this project is out of data at the moment!

LoginForm.heading: Welcome back!
LoginForm.instruction: We're glad you're back! Sign in to pick up where you left off.

RegisterForm.betaListSignUp: I'd like to help test new projects and be emailed when they're available (optional)
RegisterForm.emailConfirmError: The email addresses do not match, please try again.
RegisterForm.emailConflict: An account with this address already exists
RegisterForm.emailListSignUp: It's ok to send me an email every once in a while (optional)
RegisterForm.heading: Welcome back!
RegisterForm.instruction: Please create an account to start doing real research.
RegisterForm.passwordConfirmError: The passwords do not match, please try again.
RegisterForm.privacyAgreement: You agree to our privacy policy (required)
RegisterForm.privacyAgreementError: Agreeing to the privacy policy is required.
RegisterForm.realNameHelp: We'll use this to give you credit in scientific papers, posters, etc.
RegisterForm.realNamePatternHelp: Enter a name, not an email address
RegisterForm.underageConsent: I confirm I am the parent/guardian and give permission for my child to register by providing my email address as the main contact address. Both I and my child understand and agree to the privacy policy (required)
RegisterForm.underageEmailSignUp: If you agree, we will periodically send email promoting new research-related projects or other information relating to our research. We will not use your contact information for commercial purposes. (optional)
RegisterForm.underageNotRealName: You’ll use this name to log in. It will be shown publicly. Don’t use your real name.
RegisterForm.underageWithParent: If you are under 16 years old, tick this box to confirm that you've completed the form with your parent or guardian
RegisterForm.usernameHelp: This will be shown publicly on message boards, etc.
RegisterForm.usernamePatternHelp: Usernames can only contain letters, numbers, '.','-', and '_'

Head.defaultDescription: The Zooniverse is the world’s largest and most popular platform for people-powered research.

ProjectStatistics.subtitle: Keep track of the progress you and your fellow volunteers have made on this project.
ProjectStatistics.text: Every click counts! Join {{projectName}}'s community to complete this project and help researchers produce important results. Click "View more stats" to see even more stats.
ProjectStatistics.title: {{projectName}} Statistics
